attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition to say that you DO NOT support the lighting being switched off in / around Warwickshire at night (part night lighting, usually street lighting will be turned off 00:00 until 05:30) namely but not restricted to Warwick, Nuneaton and Bedworth, Rugby, Stratford and North Warwickshire, also that this idea should NOT be used in the FUTURE

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
